name: Elli
0:
”Alexa, turn on light”
”Alexa, turn off living room plug”
”Alexa, set light to 50 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The skill allows you to interact with your sigmacasa devices by voice. 
Enable the skill and link with your sigmacasa account. You will be able to control your devices. 

This skill can directly control electrical appliances via our product such as power plug and inlet switch. It may be not suitable for all ages as the skill will not be able to identify ages or identity of the person via voice control.
